body_html:
@ispirmustafa Thanks for review!
I found that duplication and thought that these actions could be named and moved into a function.
Yes, you are right about the name. The populate_weight_collection is confusable. I like your variant with _append_global_and_model_variables_collections but it looks like it describes all actions inside the function. What is to have something like _append_variables_to_weight_collections? It just says that some variables will be added, and what are variables are listed inside the body. What do you think?
